home.goal: On track for a Master's in AI & Data — specialisation in Intelligent Systems Architecture. This site documents my approach: designing, integrating and deploying robust AI systems, from LLM API to production monitoring.

approach.title: Architecture Approach
approach.intro: Production-first methodology: start from business needs, make constraints explicit, then choose AI building blocks and API layer with observability and deployment strategy.

steps.title: 1) Business need analysis
steps.detail: Use case, criticality, SLA, data, legal constraints, scope, acceptance criteria.

steps.title: 2) Model choice (API vs local)
steps.detail: Cost/latency/privacy trade-offs, availability, governance, GPU constraints, fallbacks and degraded modes.

steps.title: 3) Embeddings strategy
steps.detail: Granularity, chunking, versioning, evaluation, updates and source quality.

steps.title: 4) Vector database
steps.detail: Storage choice, indexes, filtering, multi-tenant, retention, performance and cost.

steps.title: 5) API layer
steps.detail: FastAPI/REST, auth, rate limiting, schemas, idempotency, traceability and contracts.

steps.title: 6) Monitoring
steps.detail: Structured logs, metrics, traces, and quality monitoring (prompt/version, retrieval, hallucinations).

steps.title: 7) Deployment
steps.detail: CI/CD, environments, secrets, scaling, observability, runbooks and operations.
